english.segment1: Verse 1. Cars, mansions and planes. Income that never refrains. The more you receive, the less you believe. In His name
english.segment2: Verse 2. There will come a day. When this will all pass away. The world will die and millions will cry. To be saved
english.segment3: Chorus. King of Kings. And Lord of all is He. Come and be a part of the reign
english.segment4: Verse 3. Pride, fortune and fame. Glory given to your name. A heart filled with greed is planting a seed. With no shame
english.segment5: Verse 4. There will come a day. When you will soon pass away. The Son will deny and then you will cry. To be saved
